name: Popconfirm
tagline: A simple action confirmation plugin for jQuery based on Twitter Bootstrap Popover
body: popconfirm ========== A simple action confirmation plugin for jQuery based on Twitter Bootstrap Popover ## How to use Add the `jquery.popconfirm.js` file into your Twitter Bootstrap document including jQuery. ```html ``` Use the jQuery method `popConfirm()` on any object you want with handle click events : ```html link ```
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
